meanings.definition: A curve traced by a point on the circumference of a circle that is rolling around another fixed circle
meanings.sent1: The cardioid was created by rolling a circle around another fixed circle.
meanings.sent2: The motion of the cardioid fascinated the students in the physics class.
meanings.sent3: The cardioid curve seemed to be dancing around the fixed circle, almost like a playful game.
meanings.sent4: As the circle rolled, the cardioid shape emerged elegantly on the paper.
meanings.sent5: The cardioid curve's movement resembled a graceful dance between two circles, mesmerizing the audience.
